description:
Koga and his friends at last meet with one of the four Pallasites.  His name is Aegaeon, of the Heavy Lightning Strike.  They attack him, but his holy sword controls gravity and slams them into the ground before they get close.  To protect them, Shun uses his chains.  But the Gravitontector, the ultimate Chronotector, makes Aegaeon immune even to Shun`s attacks!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Chronotector Equipped! The Impact of the Four Kings!
¡Cronotech colocada! ¡El impacto de los cuatro grandes Palasianos!
刻衣[クロノテクター]装着! 四天王の衝撃!
